Welcome to DMMG’s documentation!¶

DMMG project’s goal is to provide a system to automatically generate mathematical models based on Natural Language Descriptions (NLD).

Copyright (C) 2014 DMMG Project

For license information, see LICENSE.txt

Requirements¶

  • Python 2.7
  • nltk package http://nltk.org/
  • numpy package http://www.numpy.org/
  • PLY package http://www.dabeaz.com/ply/

Usage¶

% python dmmg [-h] [-c | -s] [-d delta] <query> <rootpath>

Contributors¶

Luca Da Rin Fioretto, Federico Campeotto
